name: env-guard
description: Secure, encrypted, local-only environment variable manager for developers

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm test && npm run test:integration
scripts.test: npm run build && node --test dist/src/crypto.test.js dist/src/store.test.js dist/src/loader.test.js dist/src/cli.test.js
scripts.test:watch: npm run build && node --test --watch dist/src/crypto.test.js dist/src/store.test.js dist/src/loader.test.js dist/src/cli.test.js
